ComicInfo.Title: Graduation Day at Lumberjack Academy; 8 Little Known Records for This Summer Olympics; The Butt-y Professor; Proper Tantrum-Throwing Techniques for All Sports - the Albert Belle Way; Summer Shut-Ups; Items on These Pages Are Actual Size; Scenes Left on the Cutting Room Floor (and with Good Reason!); The Real Handbook of School Decorum; If Your Teacher Corrected Graffiti...; Cracked's American Hand Signing; The Airline Emergency Card; The Appropriate... and Inappropriate Hunchback of Notre Dame; Outhouse Rock!; The Lonely Guy; Secret Work Rules; Twisted
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 22:47:21. [Issue ID 250673]
